channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.5.1
item.description:
Postgres.app 2.5.1 fixes a crash when trying to start PostgreSQL 13 or older on Macs with Apple Silicon when Rosetta is not installed.

If you have an Intel Mac, or if you have Rosetta installed already, you do not need to install this update if you already have Postgres.app 2.5.

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.23 with PostGIS 2.3.11
  • PostgreSQL 10.18 with PostGIS 2.4.9
  • PostgreSQL 11.13 with PostGIS 2.5.5
  • PostgreSQL 12.8 with PostGIS 3.0.3
  • PostgreSQL 13.4 with PostGIS 3.1.4
  • PostgreSQL 14.0 with PostGIS 3.1.4
